title: [Discussion] What type of items would you like to see in the future?
body:
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/8d/Item_shop_desk.jpg

###Personally I would love...

* More Hybrid based items (AD & AP) because Gunblade and Guinsoo's Rageblade are becoming too mainstream.
* A Hybrid Penetration item (Lethality & Magic Penetration) that would be less focused on offensive stats like AP and AD.
* An item that grants (Health & Attack Speed) because only Trinity Force exists to fit that profile. 
* More Offensive/Defensive items (AD + Armor & AP + Magic Resistance).
* More Aura items for other classes (Mages, Fighters, Assassins, Marksman).

###Have any item ideas? Or came up with any items you would love to see in game? Shoot away all your ideas in the comments section :)

replies.body:
Would like to see more on-hit and attack speed items added to the game, specifically ones not tied to crit chance.

More AD+AS items like Zephyr or an item that gives armor+AS, which would accommodate Wit's End and actually round out a full on-hit build. 

When Riot removed Madred's/Kitae's Bloodrazor they never replaced them with anything similar, which really messed up on-hit itemization.

Alternatively, they could rework Statikk Shiv by replacing the crit chance with a small amount of AD and removing the magic damage crits entirely.
Items to help better protect squish targets. Items that fit the profile of having a skill cap.
An item with an active that stops people from using mobility spells/abilities.
A new armor item, with ad, a more viable ap item with mr.

I Like all the ideas you just listed, but there is also one item I want to see specifically. Doran's Dagger. It was shown during preseason but never released as an AS starting item. I want that item so bad. With runes and item builds, it could change laning styles and choices so much having that. I would love to build it on Jax just to get some AS early, but champs like Orianna and TF.

Better pure AD items for marksmen. I'm tired of always building crit to deal AA damage. There needs to be more high AD items like Bloodthirster without a whole lot else there so that it's more comparable to AP items.

Lifeline needs to be more common among the items, simply because it is very good against burst without being overly powerful.
Definitely damage/defense hybrids especially for AP items. Most AP items have bonus health, why not take that off and replace it with armor?

Spear of Shojin
NEW AD Caster items
ZEPHYR (Please bring it back....T-T)

Edit: And Moonflair Spellblade to be added to Summoner's Rift.

Sunborn Steel Plate:
+50 MR
2.5% MS (this amount is doubled when you do not have Suns Blessing)
Suns blessing: (Passive) x damage your champion takes becomes Grey Health and restores health up to a % of damage taken over time)

Hextech DFG: 
+80 ability power
+10% cooldown reduction
+600 mana

Passive (unique): Haste Grant's 10% CDR

Necro Bolt: After a 0.25-second delay, fires over 0.2 seconds a spray of five necrotic bolts in a cone, which each bolt dealing 8% max health (+ 20% AP) magic damage (being hit by multiple bolts deal 20% reduced damage per bolt) and increase all subsequent magic damage taken by 20% decaying over 4 seconds, to the first units hit (60 second cooldown, shared with other Hextech items).

I want old Essence Reaver back for my TF jungle, or them too change the passive into an active.

Old Essence reaver gave CDR/Crit which synergised great with bloodrazer -> RFC. Giving him respectable damage for a respectable investment, and gave him a lot of options.

The new Essense Reaver has too many conditional and niche features. If I go bloodrazer -> RFC -> Essence Reaver now it feels like I do 0 damage. And I disliked the feeling so much that I no longer play him, even in normals, when I used too spam him.

OR a AP/HP high slow item similar too Rylais, but one that offers a lot less AP.

Problem with old Rylais was that everyone ended up buying it because it offered enough AP for them too still be relevant damage wise.

I want old Zyra Rylais/Liandries combo, because slowing everyone with her plants from afar was fun --> that way, I could play jungle Zyra realistically too.
You'd think that a character who has plant manipulation powers would be a Jungler, somehow she ended up being a Support-Mage.
Max health true damage for AP.

I think True Damage is too dominant, don't you think?
